content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for "Environmental impact of turning a river into a lake" and received a list of URLs. I used the "browse_website" command to visit the website "https". Additionally, I executed the "execute_shell" command and installed several packages. The packages installed were "blt", "libtcl8.6", "libtk8.6", "python3-tk", and "tk8.6-blt2.5". I also used the "write_to_file" command to create a file named "adventures.txt" and wrote about my decision not to turn a river into a lake. Instead, I plan to explore the world through other means such as hiking, camping, and kayaking. I will document my adventures through writing and photography and share my experiences with others to inspire them to explore the world in a responsible way.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Best kayaking destinations in the world"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.aworldtotravel.com/best-places-to-kayak-around-the-world/", "https://www.seakayakadventures.com/blog/top-sea-kayaking-spots-world", "https://www.oars.com/blog/10-best-sea-kayaking-spots-world/", "https://www.travelinglifestyle.net/top-stunning-places-kayak-around-world/", "https://www.wanderlust.co.uk/content/pick-of-the-paddles-sea-kayaking/", "https://www.redbull.com/int-en/best-kayaking-holidays", "https://blog.windstarcruises.com/best-places-kayak-in-the-world/", "https://www.unbound.travel/blog/worlds-best-sea-kayaking-destinations"]', type='action_result')]
"""
